text: Josep Casadevall (born 10 September 1946) is a lawyer from Andorra.Yearbook of the European Convention on Human Rights, 1996, Volume 39 (The Hague, Netherlands: Kluwer Law International, 1998), p. 169 He was born in Spain and received his law degree in Madrid in 1978. He is now a judge at the European Court of Human Rights. He represents Andorra. == References == Category:Judges of the European Court of Human Rights Category:1946 births Category:Living people Category:Andorran lawyers
title: Josep Casadevall
